title: Murder at Midnight
description: Whodunnit? Was it Lady Ridgeley Or Mr. Montrose? Or perhaps Sir Derek? The Inspector is on the case to find Lord Fenley’s killer.
quote: All of you had sufficient motive. It could have been… any one of you
altHero: inspector speaks with the butler Barnsby behind him
alt2: man in tux looks at his pocket watch
alt3: inspector speaks to bald man smoking a cigar
alt4: group of men and women talk with the inspector
